diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CA$ is $y$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $3$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $A$.
The line connecting $B$ and $C$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $C$ and $A$.
The line connecting $C$ and $D$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
